      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Refraction of ripples on surface of water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung der Kräuselung auf Oberfläche des 
Wassers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réfraction d'ondulation sur la surface de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refraction do ripples na superfície da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rifrazione dell'ondulazione su superficie di 
acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάθλαση των κυματώσεων στην επιφάνεια του ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refracción de la ondulación en la superficie 
del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how the speed of ripples on the surface of water depends on the depth of water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ripple speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ripples</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie die Geschwindigkeit 
der Kräuselung auf der Oberfläche des Wassers von der Tiefe des 
Wassers abhängt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment la vitesse de 
l'ondulation sur la surface de l'eau dépend de la profondeur de 
l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como a velocidade do 
ripples na superfície da água depende da profundidade da água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come la velocità 
dell'ondulazione sulla superficie di acqua dipende dalla profondità 
di acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς η ταχύτητα των 
κυματώσεων στην επιφάνεια του ύδατος εξαρτάται από το βάθος του 
ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo la velocidad de 
la ondulación en la superficie del agua depende de la profundidad del
agua.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
